bonus.title: Generation of resources and archmonsters
bonus.description: Archmonsters will appear 200% more quickly than usual. Resources of all types will appear 100% more quickly than usual.

bonus.title: Saved ingredients
bonus.description: Farmers save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.

bonus.title: Experience points
bonus.description: Experience gained by fighting Otomai's Ark monsters is increased by 75%.

bonus.title: Loot
bonus.description: The chances of obtaining loot from Fangs of Glass monsters are increased by 75%.

bonus.title: Plenty of wood
bonus.description: The quantity of Yew Wood and Bamboo Wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 150%.

bonus.title: Repeatable quest
bonus.description: A special repeatable quest is available today near the Bakers' Workshop in Amakna Village. It is available to players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.

bonus.title: Increased challenges
bonus.description: Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against Forest animals.

bonus.title: Experience points
bonus.description: Experience gained in the Sandy Castle is increased by 125%.

bonus.title: Item quality
bonus.description: The quality of items crafted in the city of Bonta is increased.

bonus.description: All varieties of Emerald Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.

bonus.title: Saint Potrick blessing
bonus.description: Ayerish Kaffee is waiting near the Amakna Village Inn for adventurers who want to join him for a drink. His blessing will temporarily put you in the Bulbanauze state (which will disappear when a fight is launched) as well as the Barstud state (bonus of 5% + 10 on all resistances for 15 fights).
